text: yaqinan tumhaare maalo aur jaano se tumhaari azmaayesh ki jayegi aur ye bhi yaqeen hai ke tumhe un logo ki jo tum se pehle kitaab diye gaye aur mushriko ki bahuth si dukh dene waali batein bhi sunni padegi, aur agar tum sabr karlo aur parhezgaari eqtiyaar karo, to yaqinan ye bahuth badi himmath ka kaam hai
